title: Tales of a Grandfather ... [ser. 1-3.] With notes.
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: When Rathillet and his friends were about to disperse, in sullen disappointment, the wife of a farmer at Baldinny sent a lad to tell them, that the Archbishop's coach was upon the road returning from Ceres towards St. Andrews.
